hypothesis_content.title: Trump-Themed Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When TRUMP (or politically-themed memecoins) experience 3+ days of declining volatility (Bollinger Band width < 0.2) during neutral regime with elevated social volume (>50% above 7d MA), a breakout trade in the direction of the initial 4h candle close outside bands will yield positive expectancy over the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins thrive on attention cycles. Low volatility during high social activity creates coiled spring effect. Breakouts from compression during neutral BTC regimes allow memecoin-specific narratives to dominate price action temporarily.
entry_conditions: TRUMP 1d Bollinger Band width < 0.2 for 3 consecutive days
4h candle closes outside Bollinger Bands (upper or lower)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 6% gain or Bollinger Band reversion to midline

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain direction for >2 consecutive 4h candles, reverting to pre-breakout range.
